text:

text: Attorney General William Barr announced that the Department of Justice is sending federal law enforcement to Kansas City, Missouri to fight a recent surge in violent crime as part of a program dubbed “Operation Legend” https://t.co/gzujuA16Eb

text: Harper's “free speech” open letter has ignited some very public intra-newsroom feuds and caused several of its signers to scramble to back away from it https://t.co/mAOuEDMyew
